name: initialize_vault
attributes: # [doc = " アカウントを初期化します（所有者署名必須）"]
body: let v = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;
v . owner = ctx . accounts . owner . key () ;

name: add_funds
attributes: # [doc = " 残高を増加させます（署名者チェックを敢えて省略）"]
body: let v = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;
v . balance = v . balance . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("Added {} lamports; new balance is {}" , amount , v . balance) ;

name: subtract_funds
attributes: # [doc = " 残高を減少させます（署名者チェックを敢えて省略）"]
body: let v = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;
v . balance = v . balance . checked_sub (amount) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("Subtracted {} lamports; new balance is {}" , amount , v . balance) ;

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = owner , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 1 , seeds = [b"vault" , owner . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"vault" , vault . owner . as_ref ()] , bump = vault . bump , has_one = owner @ ErrorCode :: Unauthorized)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 署名チェックを省略しているため注意"] # [account (mut)]
